docs.text:
vSphere & Horizon Upgrades


07/25/18


vSphere 6.7 now supports suspend and resume with NVIDIA vGPUs so we need to upgrade to take advantage of this and all the other enhancements 
announced
 in the Horizon View 7.5 release. These are my notes for upgrading everything in our specific environment.


References:




Update sequence for vSphere 6.7 and its compatible VMware products


VMware Product Interoperability Matrices



Best practices for upgrading to vCenter Server 6.7


Important information before upgrading to vSphere 6.7


Build numbers and versions of VMware ESXi/ESX


VMware Lifecycle Product Matrix


UEM Extended Service Branches (ESB)




Upgrading will be done in this order:




Horizon


vRealize & NSX


vSphere


Workspace One


Post-Upgrade


Automation






Horizon
 


Horizon 7.5.1 


Release Notes


Cloud Pod Architecture Considerations




Upgrade the Client Application


Upgrade View Composer


Upgrade Connection Servers


Upgrade Security Servers


Check TLS Certificates


Group Policy Template Files


Install Horizon JMP Server


Install Horizon Console







Unified Access Gateway 3.3


Release Notes




Re-Deploy UAG Appliances


Verify & Test MFA
 







App Volumes 2.14


Release Notes




Upgrade App Volume Managers


Upgrade App Volumes Templates







User Environment Manager 9.4


Release Notes




Upgrade User Environment Manager


JMP Integrated Workflow
